attributes.action: Stop subsidising air travel and introduce tax on aviation fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Properly address the effects that low cost air travel is having on the environment and make it less accessable. With the extra revenue promote holidaying within the UK and develop better, more energy efficient transport methods such as trains and electric vehicles.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
